name: Yashu
greetingText: I really like your name that I have given you
wishText: May the Good friends you made be always  with you! ;)  AndThere is no need to take any f****** third persons consent to call me just know You may not care about me BUT I CARE ABOUT YOU A LOTTTTTTT! even after 10years, To hell with what others think and also every year I will wish you I'll either the FIRET ONE or THE LAST ONE,I think most likely i will be the last one ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you Yashu!! ohhhhhh! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it, Just for your information I progrmmed it ;)
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
outroSmiley: :) And remember I'll always be only one phone call away from you
